hadiths.english_translation: Narrated by Ali: Every four-fold property or lands that were divided in the pre-Islamic period are upon their division...
Narrated by Ali: There is no bequest for a killer...
Narrated by Ali: There is no bequest nor inheritance until debt is paid...
Narrated by Ali: Nothing from the deeds of the deceased follows him after death except continuous charity...
Narrated by Ali: He wrote in his charity...
Narrated by Ali: A scholar is better than a thousand worshippers...
Narrated by Ali: The scholars are the heirs of the prophets...
Narrated by Ali from the Prophet ﷺ: Knowledge will be carried...
Narrated by Ali from the Prophet ﷺ: Whoever follows a path seeking knowledge...
Narrated by Ali from the Prophet ﷺ: Whoever makes sincere devotion to Allah...

Narrated by Ali: Learn knowledge before it is taken away. Indeed, I am not telling you this (with hand gesture), but the situation will be that a scholar lives in a tribe and dies, taking his knowledge with him. Then people will take rulers who are ignorant. They will be asked and will respond based on opinion, neglecting the traditions and practices, thus misleading and being misled. At that time this nation will be destroyed.

hadiths.english_translation: Narrated by Ali from the Prophet ﷺ: Verily, Allah does not raise knowledge by removing it suddenly, but He raises knowledge by the death of the scholars. When the people remain confused in the land, then at that time Allah will not regard them.

hadiths.english_translation: Narrated by Ali from the Prophet ﷺ: Increase remembrance of death. Whoever remembers death much disregards worldly desires, and whoever disregards desires finds calamities easy, and whoever finds calamities easy hastens toward good deeds.
Narrated by Ali from the Prophet ﷺ: Reward is according to the magnitude of suffering.
Narrated by Ali: The keeper of the Quran will be questioned as the prophets are questioned.
Narrated by Ali from the Prophet ﷺ: Learn the Quran and teach it without asking compensation.
Narrated by Ali: Whoever memorizes the Quran and thinks others have not been given the like has belittled what Allah magnified.
Narrated by Ali from the Prophet ﷺ: Allah loves the modest, forbearing, and chaste.
Narrated by Ali from the Prophet ﷺ: It suffices as sin for a person to be a burden on the Muslims.
Narrated by Ali: Whoever reads Surah al-Fatihah and says praise to Allah abundantly will have seventy types of affliction turned away.
Narrated by Ali: I went with the Prophet ﷺ and saw a man beating his slave. The Prophet ﷺ ordered kind treatment of slaves and servants.
Narrated by Ali from the Prophet ﷺ: You will not enter Paradise until you love one another. Spread greetings and visit one another.
Narrated by Ali from the Prophet ﷺ: The nearest to me are the most truthful in speech and best in character.
Narrated by Ali from the Prophet ﷺ: Whoever calls someone from polytheism to Islam has the reward of freeing a soul.
